snippet.title: Big Rumble Boxing: Creed Champions - Exclusive Official Reveal Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
Step into the ring and show off your boxing skills in a knockout arcade experience, where you can fight as 20 iconic characters from the Creed and Rocky universe. Take on world-class opponents across a variety of thrilling locations, or challenge your friends and family in intense, head-to-head matches. Available on Console and PC on September 3rd, 2021.

#IGN #SummerofGaming
